label: 賀茂の御生
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A nighttime rite that reenacted the appearance on earth of Wakeikazuchi, the deity of the Upper Kamo Shrine.  It took place on the middle Monkey day in the fourth month and was followed the next day by the Kamo Festival.[別雷、賀茂][RK]
